explains: n. 分类；分门别类；编目方法

sentences.en: Her first novel defies easy categorization.
sentences.cn: 她的处女作小说不容易归类。

sentences.en: This process is called matching or categorization.
sentences.cn: 这个过程称为匹配或分类。

sentences.en: This is particularly likely in the area of categorization.
sentences.cn: 在分类的过程中这一点可能出现。
